US-China conclude two days of military talks in WashingtonThe United States and China concluded two days of military talks in Washington on Tuesday, the Pentagon said, the latest engagement between the two countries since they agreed to resume military-to-military ties. Taiwan does not consider China satellite launch election interferenceTaiwan's presidential office said it did not consider the launch of a Chinese satellite whose rocket flew over southern Taiwan an attempt at election interference ahead of presidential and parliamentary polls on Saturday. Intel challenges Nvidia, Qualcomm with 'AI PC' chips for carsIntel said on Tuesday it will launch automotive versions of its newest AI-enabled chips, taking on Qualcomm and Nvidia in the market for semiconductors that can power the brains of future cars. What does the Gotham City report say about Grifols?Shares in Grifols fell as much as over 40% on Tuesday, wiping $3.83 billion off its market value, after hedge fund Gotham City Research questioned its accounting, prompting the Spanish drugmaker to "categorically" deny any wrongdoing. World Bank forecasts 2024 global growth to slow for third consecutive yearThe World Bank warned on Tuesday that global growth in 2024 is set to slow for a third year in a row, prolonging poverty and debilitating debt levels in many developing countries. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 14:35:32 GMT WONLBIHCPVP2RKLP622CWTSE7A https://www.reuters.com/markets/world-bank-forecasts-2024-global-growth-slow-third-consecutive-year-2024-01-09/David Lawder市场宏观问题
US trade deficit shrinks in November on falling importsThe U.S. trade deficit unexpectedly narrowed in November as imports of consumer goods fell to a one-year low amid slowing domestic demand, a trend that, if it persists in December, could result in trade having no impact on economic growth in the fourth quarter. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 13:47:29 GMT 2PRUBGD7P5IONIFQBZN7VGXSVQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/us-trade-deficit-narrows-november-imports-fall-2024-01-09/Lucia Mutikani市场美国市场
Grifols to hold board meeting Tuesday afternoon after Gotham City reportSpanish pharmaceutical company Grifols is set to hold a board meeting on Tuesday afternoon in reaction to a report from Gotham City Research questioning the company's accounting released earlier, board member Tomas Daga told Reuters. China likely dethroned Japan as world's top auto exporter in 2023: China groupChina is estimated to have overtaken Japan as the world's largest auto exporter in 2023, the China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) said on Tuesday, as BYD , Chery and other domestic automakers made major strides overseas.
